name: Cracks (Rakanishu)
description:
This map is available for Serious Sam: The Second Encounter and Serious Sam Classics: Revolution. It is also officially implemented in Serious Tournament Mod.

Author: Rakanishu 
Credits: Nifran Tay (textures)
Creation date: 6 December 2014
Latest Version: 30 July 2021

Changelog

Version 2
* Changed position and color in level list.
* High Quality Thumbnail
* Minor shadow fixes

Features:

- Deathmatch map which takes place in an ancient temple
- Completely new map style using Nifran Tay's textures!

Serious Tournament Mod Availability

Serious Tournament Mod is a mod for Serious Sam Classic: The Second Encounter developed by Troy and Zeo. It has a lots of features as long as it's a mod in which you can play with bots in DM, TDM, CTF, etc... and even Survival. So this level Lumis is available in this mod in CTF and Domination gamemodes, you can get the mod here

Note : The map hasn't been updated to Serious Sam: Revolution.
